Title: Relates to limitations on the granting of custody of a minor
Summary: Prohibits a court from granting custody of a minor to anyone who has been convicted of any of the enumerated sex crimes except where a court finds there is no significant risk to the child.
LawCode: Amd §§240 & 70, Dom Rel L; amd §651, Fam Ct Act
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the domestic relations law and the family court act, in relation to the granting of custody of a minor
